text:
National Gas (Tasmania) Law

The National Gas Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the National Gas (South Australia) Act 2008 of South Australia is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the National Gas (Tasmania) Act 2008 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the National Gas (Tasmania) Law

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the National Gas Law were applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania on 1 July 2008.

2. Further information
    The full text of the National Gas Law is set out in the Schedule to the National Gas (South Australia) Act 2008 of South Australia (click on INFORMATION for a link to South Australian legislation). See the National Gas (Tasmania) Act 2008 for modifications to the National Gas Law as it applies in Tasmania.
